verses.verse: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed, and poureth out his complaint before Jehovah. Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And let my cry <S%H7775><s%> come unto thee <S%H935><s%>.

Hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my distress <S%H6862><s%>: Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H3117><s%>; In the day when I call <S%H7121><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me speedily <S%H4118><s%>.
For my days <S%H3117><s%> consume <S%H3615><s%> away like smoke <S%H6227><s%>, And my bones <S%H6106><s%> are burned <S%H2787><s%> as a firebrand <S%H4168><s%>.
My heart <S%H3820><s%> is smitten <S%H5221><s%> like grass <S%H6212><s%>, and withered <S%H3001><s%>; For I forget <S%H7911><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> my bread <S%H3899><s%>.
By reason of the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my groaning <S%H585><s%> My bones <S%H6106><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to my flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
I am like <S%H1819><s%> a pelican <S%H6893><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; I am become as an owl <S%H3563><s%> of the waste places <S%H2723><s%>.
I watch <S%H8245><s%>, and am become like a sparrow <S%H6833><s%> That is alone <S%H909><s%> upon the house-top <S%H1406><s%>.
Mine enemies <S%H341><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> me all the day <S%H3117><s%>; They that are mad <S%H1984><s%> against me do curse by me <S%H7650><s%>.
For I have eaten <S%H398><s%> ashes <S%H665><s%> like bread <S%H3899><s%>, And mingled <S%H4537><s%> my drink <S%H8249><s%> with weeping <S%H1065><s%>,
Because <S%H6440><s%> of thine indignation <S%H2195><s%> and thy wrath <S%H7110><s%>: For thou hast taken me up <S%H5375><s%>, and cast me away <S%H7993><s%>.
My days <S%H3117><s%> are like a shadow <S%H6738><s%> that declineth <S%H5186><s%>; And I am withered <S%H3001><s%> like grass <S%H6212><s%>.
But thou <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, wilt abide <S%H3427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; And thy memorial <S%H2143><s%> name unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Thou wilt arise <S%H6965><s%>, and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon Zion <S%H6726><s%>; For it is time <S%H6256><s%> to have pity <S%H2603><s%> upon her <S%H4150><s%>, Yea, the set time is come <S%H935><s%>.
For thy servants <S%H5650><s%> take pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in her stones <S%H68><s%>, And have pity <S%H2603><s%> upon her dust <S%H6083><s%>.
So the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall fear <S%H3372><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> thy glory <S%H3519><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath built up <S%H1129><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>; He hath appeared <S%H7200><s%> in his glory <S%H3519><s%>.
He hath regarded <S%H6437><s%> the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of the destitute <S%H6199><s%>, And hath not despised <S%H959><s%> their prayer <S%H8605><s%>.

This shall be written <S%H3789><s%> for the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%>; And a people <S%H5971><s%> which shall be created <S%H1254><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>.
For he hath looked down <S%H8259><s%> from the height <S%H4791><s%> of his sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>; From heaven <S%H8064><s%> did Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> behold <S%H5027><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>;
To hear <S%H8085><s%> the sighing <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner <S%H615><s%>; To loose <S%H6605><s%> those that are appointed <S%H1121><s%> to death <S%H8546><s%>;
That men may declare <S%H5608><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, And his praise <S%H8416><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>;
When the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are gathered <S%H6908><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, And the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
He weakened <S%H6031><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>; He shortened <S%H7114><s%> my days <S%H3117><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%>, O my God <S%H410><s%>, take me not away <S%H5927><s%> in the midst <S%H2677><s%> of my days <S%H3117><s%>: Thy years <S%H8141><s%> are throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Of old <S%H6440><s%> didst thou lay the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> are the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>.

They shall perish <S%H6><s%>, but thou shalt endure <S%H5975><s%>; Yea <S%H1086><s%>, all of them shall wax old like a garment <S%H899><s%>; As a vesture <S%H3830><s%> shalt thou change <S%H2498><s%> them <S%H2498><s%>, and they shall be changed:
But thou art the same <S%H8141><s%>, And thy years shall have no end <S%H8552><s%>.
The children <S%H1121><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall continue <S%H7931><s%>, And their seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>.
